name: Microsoft Excel MIME HTML Spreadsheet
summary: Learn about .XLSMHTML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Excel no longer supports the XLSMHTML format. Instead of saving spreadsheets as XLSMHTML files, you can save them as .MHTML and .MHT files, which are more widely supported.
NOTE: To create a webpage version of your document in Excel 365, select File â†’ Save As, then choose the "Single File Web Page (*.mht, *.mhtml)" option from the dropdown menu.

description: An XLSMHTML file is an archived MIME HTML spreadsheet saved by Microsoft Excel (2007 and earlier), a common spreadsheet application. It contains HTML code that represents the spreadsheet in a format similar to the original .XLS file. XLSMHTML files are used for viewing published spreadsheets in a web browser.

instructions: Unfortunately, there are no known applications that fully support the XLSMHTML format since Microsoft Excel dropped support for it.
